title: Common Core Mathematics Questions
description: Aligned with Common Core State Standards for Mathematics (Grades 5-8)

questions.question: A recipe calls for 2/3 cup of flour. If you want to make 1.5 times the recipe, how much flour do you need?
questions.gameContext: Food Supply item - calculating resource needs

questions.question: Your exploration team travels 45 miles in 3 hours. At this rate, how far will you travel in 5 hours?
You have x energy units. After using 12 units and gaining 3 times what you started with, you have 45 units. What is x?
You find a circular portal with radius 4 meters. What is its approximate area?
Your health decreases by 5 points each turn. If you start with 60 health, which function represents your health after t turns?
questions.explanation: Starting at 60 and decreasing by 5 each turn: h(t) = 60 - 5t

questions.question: A map shows 3 inches represents 15 miles. If two cities are 7 inches apart on the map, what is the actual distance?
questions.explanation: Scale: 3 inches = 15 miles, so 1 inch = 5 miles. Distance = 7 × 5 = 35 miles
questions.gameContext: Map Reading item - scale and proportion

questions.question: Your score increases by 8 points, then decreases by 15 points, then increases by 3 points. What is the total change?
A treasure chest is 8 feet long, 4 feet wide, and 3 feet tall. What is its volume?
questions.explanation: Volume = length × width × height = 8 × 4 × 3 = 96 cubic feet

questions.question: You collected data on maze completion times: 12, 15, 18, 12, 20, 15, 12 minutes. What is the mode?
questions.explanation: Mode is the most frequently occurring value. 12 appears three times, more than any other value

questions.question: Your inventory can hold items at a ratio of 3 tools to 5 supplies. If you have 18 tools, how many supplies can you carry?
questions.explanation: Ratio 3:5 means 3/5 = 18/x. Cross multiply: 3x = 90, x = 30 supplies

questions.question: Two paths diverge. Path A is 2x + 5 miles long. Path B is x + 12 miles long. They're equal distance. Find x.
questions.explanation: 2x + 5 = x + 12. Subtract x: x + 5 = 12. Subtract 5: x = 7

questions.question: You're building a rectangular base camp. It's 12 meters by 8 meters. What is the area?
questions.explanation: Area of rectangle = length × width = 12 × 8 = 96 square meters

implementationNotes.integration: These questions can replace existing hazard encounter questions
implementationNotes.difficulty: Questions are tagged easy/medium/hard for differentiation
implementationNotes.feedback: Each question includes explanation for formative assessment
implementationNotes.alignment: Every question explicitly tied to Common Core standard
implementationNotes.gameDesign: Questions contextualized within game mechanics for engagement
